room_des: The Hotel has a Swiss Chalet style sloping roof structure. Deluxe rooms are on the 4th floor (with straight ceilings) or 5th floor (with sloping chalet style ceilings). Other than style of ceiling - room sizes and amenities are identical across all Deluxe rooms. These would be allocated to guest as per availability and entertaining any preference on this matter would not be possible.Rooms are heated in winter (heaters)

room_des: The room boasts valley views and a dining area. After a hectic day, tune in to the latest movies or shows on the 32-inch flat screen TV. De-stress and refresh in the ensuite bathroom featuring An Essence bath amenities, a bathtub, walk-in shower, granite flooring.Rooms are heated in winter (heaters)

room_des: Indulge in a luxurious stay in this room known to have a dining area, living room and private jacuzzi. The room has a sloping swiss chalet type cieling starting at 9feet and sloping downwards and houses one king size bed and another sofa cum bed., living room. Stream the latest movies and shows on the 32-inch flat screen TV. The well-designed bathroom features An Essence bath amenities, a bathtub, walk-in shower, Jacuzzi ,granite flooring. Rooms are heated in winter (heaters)
